params.member: The member to remove from the deactivation member set.

params.who: is the address to be added.

params.member: The member to add to the deactivation member set.

params.cursor: The index at which to start.
params.perPage: How many records should be returned at most.

params.candidate: The address to check activation status on.

returns._0: A `bool` equal to `true` when `candidate` is a member.

params.member: The member for which a new FAST membership has been added.
The member for which a FAST membership has been removed.

params.index: is the offset at which the pagination operation should start.
params.perPage: is how many items should be returned.

returns._0: A `(address[], uint256)` tuple, which first item is the list of addresses and the second item a cursor to the next page.

params.member: The address of the member to be removed.

RequiresMembersManager(address).notice: Happens when a function is called by an address that is not a members manager.

RequiresValidMember(address).notice: Happens when an address is used as a member but is not valid.

MemberAdded(address).notice: Emited when a member is added to the implementing contract.

MemberRemoved(address).notice: Emited when a member is removed to the implementing contract.

activateMember(address).notice: Activates a member at the Marketplace level.

addMember(address).notice: Adds a member to the list of known members.

deactivateMember(address).notice: Deactivates a member at the Marketplace level.

fastMemberships(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Allows to query FAST memberships for a given member address.

isActiveMember(address).notice: Given a member returns it's activation status.

isMember(address).notice: Queries whether a given address is a member or not.

memberAddedToFast(address).notice: Callback from FAST contracts allowing the Marketplace contract to keep track of FAST memberships.

memberRemovedFromFast(address).notice: Callback from FAST contracts allowing the Marketplace contract to keep track of FAST memberships.

paginateMembers(uint256,uint256).notice: Queries pages of members based on a start index and a page size.

removeMember(address).notice: Removes a member from this contract.Requires that the caller is a member of this Issuer.Emits a `AHasMembers.MemberRemoved` event.

userdoc.notice: The Marketplace Access facet is in charge of keeping track of marketplace members.
